sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import BookStoreContext from '../../Context/bookStorContext'; export const CartItem = ({ item }) => { const { image, title, author, quantity, price } = item; const { removeFromCart } = useContext(BookStoreContext) return (

Title : {title}

Authors : {author}

{quantity}
{Math.floor(price * quantity)}$
removeFromCart} class="bi bi-trash-fill">
) }
